plot: The gang arrives at Kyoshi Island and are captured by some Kyoshi warriors. When Aang reveals that he is the avatar, news quickly spreads out and suddenly reaches to Prince Zuko who then goes to Kyoshi Island to capture him.

The gang flies to Kyoshi island, previously named for Avatar Kyoshi, one of Aang's past lives, with high hopes for some Koi surfing. Once getting there they meet the Kyoshi warriors, a small band of woman soldiers. When captured, Sokka's ego is severely damaged. In an attempt to heal it, he challenges the Kyoshi warriors and ends up learning more about fighting and developing a romance with the leader, Suki. Meanwhile, Aang is being adored by the town's female population. Katara seems annoyed but is only concerned for Aang's safety. When Zuko arrives on Kyoshi and begins to wreak havoc on the small island Aang makes the decision to leave, no longer endangering the lives of the people living there. Zuko follows.—SheDevil~ZukosGal
